title: Hey, got my pessat result 2021. I might get CSE in RR campus, had a small query.

comments.body: dont they have to follow the UGC guidelines?
its 3.4 lakh per annum, this is what i heard im not an alumi just a fellow student
if it doesnt interest you id suggest you not to take it and try out other options that is available to you
hey, is the counselling offline or online?
Its offline but if you have a genuine reason you ask them and attend it online

Hahaha hahaha hahaha hahaha hahaha hahaha lololol lololol...... They NEVER follow ugc guidelines and openly flout them. And UGC as an organization has no teeth. No Action. None whatsoever can be taken against these guys.
Hey does that mean suppose we register during counselling and later don't want to go here they won't return the fee?
No no they will return your fees. That they will. Not an issue in that regard.
Why do you want to come to Pes? Please think twice before coming here. This place is shit.
ah thank u, that i dint know
